sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO IDDL_AASS_OPIN_V ( FCTY_CD , IDDL_AASS_NO , GVMT_CD , SCN_FITR_FREE_X , SCN_FITR_FREE_Y , SCN_FITR_FREE_Z , SCN_FITR_BOT_X , SCN_FITR_BOT_Y , SCN_FITR_BOT_Z , SCN_FITR_MID_X , SCN_FITR_MID_Y1 , SCN_FITR_MID_Y2 , SCN_FITR_TOP_X , SCN_FITR_TOP_Y1 , SCN_FITR_TOP_Y2 , ANA_OPIN_IDR_AMP , ANA_OPIN_SIMC_AREA , ANA_OPIN_STR_HEI , ANA_OPIN_STR_TYCD , ANA_OPIN_STR_NM , ANA_OPIN_STR_FRQ_WIN_MJ_L , ANA_OPIN_STR_FRQ_WIN_MJ_H , ANA_OPIN_STR_FRQ_WIN_SHOT_L , ANA_OPIN_STR_FRQ_WIN_SHOT_H , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_MEN_SLIT , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_MEN_NOR , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_MEN_HSH , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_SLIT , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_NOR , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_HSH , ANA_OPIN_FRQ_PRV_X , ANA_OPIN_FRQ_PRV_Y , SF_IDR_RNG_SMF_SF , SF_IDR_RNG_SMF_CHK , SF_IDR_RNG_SMF_HSH , SF_IDR_RNG_SMF_SHR , SF_IDR_RNG_SEF_SF , SF_IDR_RNG_SEF_CHK , SF_IDR_RNG_SEF_HSH , SF_IDR_RNG_SEF_SHR , SF_IDR_RNG_RCF_SF , SF_IDR_RNG_RCF_CHK , SF_IDR_RNG_RCF_HSH , SF_IDR_RNG_RCF_SHR , SF_IDR_RNG_RCSW_SF , SF_IDR_RNG_RCSW_CHK , SF_IDR_RNG_RCSW_HSH , SF_IDR_RNG_RCSW_SHR , SF_NAT_FRQ_RNG , SF_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_RNG , SF_OVR_ACC_RNG , INPT_USR_ID , INPT_DT , UPDT_USR_ID , UPDT_DT ) VALUES ( #fctyCd# , #iddlAassNo# , #gvmtCd# , #scnFitrFreeX# , #scnFitrFreeY# , #scnFitrFreeZ# , #scnFitrBotX# , #scnFitrBotY# , #scnFitrBotZ# , #scnFitrMidX# , #scnFitrMidY1# , #scnFitrMidY2# , #scnFitrTopX# , #scnFitrTopY1# , #scnFitrTopY2# , #anaOpinIdrAmp# , #anaOpinSimcArea# , #anaOpinStrHei# , #anaOpinStrTycd# , #anaOpinStrNm# , #anaOpinStrFrqWinMjL# , #anaOpinStrFrqWinMjH# , #anaOpinStrFrqWinShotL# , #anaOpinStrFrqWinShotH# , #anaOpinLimiStatMenSlit# , #anaOpinLimiStatMenNor# , #anaOpinLimiStatMenHsh# , #anaOpinLimiStatSlit# , #anaOpinLimiStatNor# , #anaOpinLimiStatHsh# , #anaOpinFrqPrvX# , #anaOpinFrqPrvY# , #sfIdrRngSmfSf# , #sfIdrRngSmfChk# , #sfIdrRngSmfHsh# , #sfIdrRngSmfShr# , #sfIdrRngSefSf# , #sfIdrRngSefChk# , #sfIdrRngSefHsh# , #sfIdrRngSefShr# , #sfIdrRngRcfSf# , #sfIdrRngRcfChk# , #sfIdrRngRcfHsh# , #sfIdrRngRcfShr# , #sfIdrRngRcswSf# , #sfIdrRngRcswChk# , #sfIdrRngRcswHsh# , #sfIdrRngRcswShr# , #sfNatFrqRng# , #sfStrFreeNatFrqRng# , #sfOvrAccRng# , #inptUsrId# , #inptDt# , #updtUsrId# , #updtDt# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE IDDL_AASS_OPIN_V SET FCTY_CD=#fctyCd# , IDDL_AASS_NO=#iddlAassNo# , SCN_FITR_FREE_X=#scnFitrFreeX# , SCN_FITR_FREE_Y=#scnFitrFreeY# , SCN_FITR_FREE_Z=#scnFitrFreeZ# , SCN_FITR_BOT_X=#scnFitrBotX# , SCN_FITR_BOT_Y=#scnFitrBotY# , SCN_FITR_BOT_Z=#scnFitrBotZ# , SCN_FITR_MID_X=#scnFitrMidX# , SCN_FITR_MID_Y1=#scnFitrMidY1# , SCN_FITR_MID_Y2=#scnFitrMidY2# , SCN_FITR_TOP_X=#scnFitrTopX# , SCN_FITR_TOP_Y1=#scnFitrTopY1# , SCN_FITR_TOP_Y2=#scnFitrTopY2# , ANA_OPIN_IDR_AMP=#anaOpinIdrAmp# , ANA_OPIN_SIMC_AREA=#anaOpinSimcArea# , ANA_OPIN_STR_HEI=#anaOpinStrHei# , ANA_OPIN_STR_TYCD=#anaOpinStrTycd# , ANA_OPIN_STR_NM=#anaOpinStrNm# , ANA_OPIN_STR_FRQ_WIN_MJ_L=#anaOpinStrFrqWinMjL# , ANA_OPIN_STR_FRQ_WIN_MJ_H=#anaOpinStrFrqWinMjH# , ANA_OPIN_STR_FRQ_WIN_SHOT_L=#anaOpinStrFrqWinShotL# , ANA_OPIN_STR_FRQ_WIN_SHOT_H=#anaOpinStrFrqWinShotH# , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_MEN_SLIT=#anaOpinLimiStatMenSlit# , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_MEN_NOR=#anaOpinLimiStatMenNor# , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_MEN_HSH=#anaOpinLimiStatMenHsh# , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_SLIT=#anaOpinLimiStatSlit# , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_NOR=#anaOpinLimiStatNor# , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_HSH=#anaOpinLimiStatHsh# , ANA_OPIN_FRQ_PRV_X=#anaOpinFrqPrvX# , ANA_OPIN_FRQ_PRV_Y=#anaOpinFrqPrvY# , SF_IDR_RNG_SMF_SF=#sfIdrRngSmfSf# , SF_IDR_RNG_SMF_CHK=#sfIdrRngSmfChk# , SF_IDR_RNG_SMF_HSH=#sfIdrRngSmfHsh# , SF_IDR_RNG_SMF_SHR=#sfIdrRngSmfShr# , SF_IDR_RNG_SEF_SF=#sfIdrRngSefSf# , SF_IDR_RNG_SEF_CHK=#sfIdrRngSefChk# , SF_IDR_RNG_SEF_HSH=#sfIdrRngSefHsh# , SF_IDR_RNG_SEF_SHR=#sfIdrRngSefShr# , SF_IDR_RNG_RCF_SF=#sfIdrRngRcfSf# , SF_IDR_RNG_RCF_CHK=#sfIdrRngRcfChk# , SF_IDR_RNG_RCF_HSH=#sfIdrRngRcfHsh# , SF_IDR_RNG_RCF_SHR=#sfIdrRngRcfShr# , SF_IDR_RNG_RCSW_SF=#sfIdrRngRcswSf# , SF_IDR_RNG_RCSW_CHK=#sfIdrRngRcswChk# , SF_IDR_RNG_RCSW_HSH=#sfIdrRngRcswHsh# , SF_IDR_RNG_RCSW_SHR=#sfIdrRngRcswShr# , SF_NAT_FRQ_RNG=#sfNatFrqRng# , SF_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_RNG=#sfStrFreeNatFrqRng# , SF_OVR_ACC_RNG=#sfOvrAccRng# , INPT_USR_ID=#inptUsrId# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , UPDT_USR_ID=#updtUsrId# , UPDT_DT=#updtDt# WHERE FCTY_CD=#fctyCd# AND IDDL_AASS_NO=#iddlAassNo#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM IDDL_AASS_OPIN_V WHERE FCTY_CD=#fctyCd# AND IDDL_AASS_NO=#iddlAassNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT FCTY_CD , IDDL_AASS_NO , SCN_FITR_FREE_X , SCN_FITR_FREE_Y , SCN_FITR_FREE_Z , SCN_FITR_BOT_X , SCN_FITR_BOT_Y , SCN_FITR_BOT_Z , SCN_FITR_MID_X , SCN_FITR_MID_Y1 , SCN_FITR_MID_Y2 , SCN_FITR_TOP_X , SCN_FITR_TOP_Y1 , SCN_FITR_TOP_Y2 , ANA_OPIN_IDR_AMP , ANA_OPIN_SIMC_AREA , ANA_OPIN_STR_HEI , ANA_OPIN_STR_TYCD , ANA_OPIN_STR_NM , ANA_OPIN_STR_FRQ_WIN_MJ_L , ANA_OPIN_STR_FRQ_WIN_MJ_H , ANA_OPIN_STR_FRQ_WIN_SHOT_L , ANA_OPIN_STR_FRQ_WIN_SHOT_H , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_MEN_SLIT , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_MEN_NOR , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_MEN_HSH , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_SLIT , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_NOR , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_HSH , ANA_OPIN_FRQ_PRV_X , ANA_OPIN_FRQ_PRV_Y , SF_IDR_RNG_SMF_SF , SF_IDR_RNG_SMF_CHK , SF_IDR_RNG_SMF_HSH , SF_IDR_RNG_SMF_SHR , SF_IDR_RNG_SEF_SF , SF_IDR_RNG_SEF_CHK , SF_IDR_RNG_SEF_HSH , SF_IDR_RNG_SEF_SHR , SF_IDR_RNG_RCF_SF , SF_IDR_RNG_RCF_CHK , SF_IDR_RNG_RCF_HSH , SF_IDR_RNG_RCF_SHR , SF_IDR_RNG_RCSW_SF , SF_IDR_RNG_RCSW_CHK , SF_IDR_RNG_RCSW_HSH , SF_IDR_RNG_RCSW_SHR , SF_NAT_FRQ_RNG , SF_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_RNG , SF_OVR_ACC_RNG , INPT_USR_ID , INPT_DT , UPDT_USR_ID , UPDT_DT FROM IDDL_AASS_OPIN_V WHERE FCTY_CD=#fctyCd# AND IDDL_AASS_NO=#iddlAassNo#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT FCTY_CD , IDDL_AASS_NO , SCN_FITR_FREE_X , SCN_FITR_FREE_Y , SCN_FITR_FREE_Z , SCN_FITR_BOT_X , SCN_FITR_BOT_Y , SCN_FITR_BOT_Z , SCN_FITR_MID_X , SCN_FITR_MID_Y1 , SCN_FITR_MID_Y2 , SCN_FITR_TOP_X , SCN_FITR_TOP_Y1 , SCN_FITR_TOP_Y2 , ANA_OPIN_IDR_AMP , ANA_OPIN_SIMC_AREA , ANA_OPIN_STR_HEI , ANA_OPIN_STR_TYCD , ANA_OPIN_STR_NM , ANA_OPIN_STR_FRQ_WIN_MJ_L , ANA_OPIN_STR_FRQ_WIN_MJ_H , ANA_OPIN_STR_FRQ_WIN_SHOT_L , ANA_OPIN_STR_FRQ_WIN_SHOT_H , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_MEN_SLIT , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_MEN_NOR , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_MEN_HSH , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_SLIT , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_NOR , ANA_OPIN_LIMI_STAT_HSH , ANA_OPIN_FRQ_PRV_X , ANA_OPIN_FRQ_PRV_Y , SF_IDR_RNG_SMF_SF , SF_IDR_RNG_SMF_CHK , SF_IDR_RNG_SMF_HSH , SF_IDR_RNG_SMF_SHR , SF_IDR_RNG_SEF_SF , SF_IDR_RNG_SEF_CHK , SF_IDR_RNG_SEF_HSH , SF_IDR_RNG_SEF_SHR , SF_IDR_RNG_RCF_SF , SF_IDR_RNG_RCF_CHK , SF_IDR_RNG_RCF_HSH , SF_IDR_RNG_RCF_SHR , SF_IDR_RNG_RCSW_SF , SF_IDR_RNG_RCSW_CHK , SF_IDR_RNG_RCSW_HSH , SF_IDR_RNG_RCSW_SHR , SF_NAT_FRQ_RNG , SF_STR_FREE_NAT_FRQ_RNG , SF_OVR_ACC_RNG , INPT_USR_ID , INPT_DT , UPDT_USR_ID , UPDT_DT FROM IDDL_AASS_OPIN_V WHERE 1=1
FCTY_CD = #searchKeyword#
IDDL_AASS_NO LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY FCTY_CD DESC , IDDL_AASS_NO DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM IDDL_AASS_OPIN_V WHERE 1=1
FCTY_CD = #searchKeyword#
IDDL_AASS_NO LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
